title: STAT+: Wyden, Warren expand UnitedHealth nursing home investigation
description: The investigation focuses on allegations that UnitedHealth improperly limited hospitalizations among some people covered by its Medicare plans.
content: The investigation focuses on allegations that UnitedHealth improperly limited hospitalizations among some people covered by its Medicare plans.
